name: Rat.Space.Cheese
description:
One of my projects I have worked on for my Games Proposal at UCLan (University of Central Lancashire) set on the moon.

You play as Whiskers, a security rat who is as he is tasked with clearing out all of the cheese monsters in one of the lunar mining facilities. These monsters appeared after a disturbance in the mine and are standing between the rats and their supply of cheese.

UCLan Games Design course: HOME - University of Central Lancashire Games Design Course (gamescourse.co.uk)
